user_request: A romantic poem about two hearts beating as one.
final_poem:
Two beats in perfect harmony,
One rhythm, one sole melody.
In syncopated love's sweet refrain,
Our chests entwined like tender vines in pain.

When mine encounters yours so fine,
It whispers secrets to my soul divine.
Each pounding cadence an eager sign,
As our two hearts synchronize their rhyme.

With every pulse, a new world born,
Where space between no longer feels forlorn.
In this love-driven waltz of heart and fate,
Together we dance with each eternal state.
